thread.title: Jennifer Lopez & Marc Anthony Get Together To Celebrate Their Twins' Birthdays!
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lopez & Marc Anthony Get Together To Celebrate Their Twins' Birthdays!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Jennifer Lopez & Marc Anthony Get Together To Celebrate Their Twins' Birthdays!
text:
The couple marked the day with longtime friends Leah Remini and her husband Angelo Pagan . Leah posted the photo on her Instagram and wrote: 
"Celebrating our Max & Emme's 9th birthday @jlo @marcanthony @therealangelopagan #familia #memories #friendship" 
So sweet! 
J.Lo and Marc seem to have a really wonderful, friendly relationship as exes. Just a few months ago at the Latin Grammys in November the two even smooched on the lips onstage! 
Though we doubt the two will be getting back together anytime soon â€” following that smooch, Marc announced his divorce from his fourth wife, Venezuelan model Shannon De Lima . 
Maybe there's hope yet! 
Thanks to Leah for posting this pic, by the way! Neither Jennifer nor Marc have posted anything to commemorate their children's birthdays!
